preceding: Lenart Kova discovered a hidden device altering BCI data.
dilemma: Lenart must decide whether to expose internal sabotage or focus on foreign cyber-espionage.
reason: Revealing sabotage risks his network; blaming espionage could increase city tensions.
choice_a: Expose the internal sabotage, implicating a rogue administrator and an internal conspiracy.
choice_b: Highlight foreign cyber-espionage as the cause, uniting Stenograd against an external threat.
